name: SBIR CONSORTIUM
description: Consortium focused on supporting positive changes to SBIR and STTR programs
sampleDescriptions: Reauthorization of the Small Business Innovation Research (SBIR), Small Business Technology Transfer (STTR), and Federal and State Technology (FAST) Partnership programs.
